section.title: Formatting expectations
section.p: Processors typically apply bold highlighting to the contents of the b element.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The b element is specialized from ph. It is defined in the highlighting-domain module.

example.p: The following code sample illustrates how bold highlighting is used to draw a reader's attention to a phrase:
example.codeblock: Use the bold tag for visual emphasis only; do not use it if another phrase-level element better signifies the reason for the emphasis.
